'''Radiant Spincrystal 15''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[Angel's Share (Soundtrack)|Angel's Share]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on top of a cart by the stairs in [[Angel's Share]].
